title: Chatino Tataltepec (2009) New Testament
description: Chatino Tataltepec translation of the New Testament published in 2009 by Bible League. Tataltepec Chatino, also known as Lowland Chatino and Chatino Occidental Bajo, is an indigenous Mesoamerican language, one of the Chatino family of the Oto-Manguean languages. It is not intelligible with other Chatino languages.

language.name: Tataltepec Chatino
language.area: Southeast Oaxaca, Juquila District, extreme west lowland Chatino area, Tataltepec de Valdez and San Pedro Tututepec towns; a few in nearby Spanish centers.
